,,, Network Transformer;Delta;LFE9203;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = NAS-205 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 02/2010 |reldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B004XFYGTO |asin_country = US |asin2 = B004XFYGTO |asin_country2 = GB |asin3 = B004XFYGTO |asin_country3 = DE |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Main board on the bottom side silkscreened with "8NAS205.3A1G" and "1016"
PCIe and SATA ports are on sub-board silkscreened with "8NAS205S.1A1G" :OEM: [[Alpha Networks]] NAS-205 ===Specifications=== *[[Marvell]] 1.2 GHz ARM CPU, RAM 512MB DDR2, 128MB Flash, 1x GbE LAN *2x 3.5" HDD SATA I/II (up to 3TB, total 6TB), RAID 0/1/JBOD, 3x USB 2.0 *PSU: Jentec Technology Co. Ltd. JTA0512; 100~240V 1.2А ÷ 12V/5V 3А :AC Input: 100~240 VAC, 1.2A, 50/60Hz; DC Output: 12V/3A, 5V/3A *Dimensions: 211 mm x 129 mm x 120 mm *Weight: 970 g *Powerful 1.2 GHz CPU and 512MB DDR2 Memory *10 second system backup and super-fast recovery *Effortlessly manage and share huge files remotely *Home entertainment center with virtual DVD, UPnP :media and iTunes server ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/component/content/article/72-asus-nas-m25.html ''ASUS NAS-M25'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] ([https://www.citilink.ru/catalog/computers_and_notebooks/hddstores/625590/rev3384/#readreview images]) :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 (88F6-B1A2, Kirkwood) :@1.2GHz Feroceon (Cache II 256Kb/400MHz) *[https://ru.gecid.com/storag/asus_nas-m25/ ''ASUS NAS-M25'' on '''GecID'''] (Chipset images) :OUI: 5C:33:8E ([[Alpha Networks]]) ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|cpuinfo >> • |

}} ==See also== :[[List of NAS Devices]] *ASUS NAS-M25 - ''Dual NAS System'' (2x SATA II, 3TB HDD, 3x USB 2.0) :Marvell @1.2GHz CPU, 512MB RAM, GbE LAN, RAID, VMware support *[[ASUSTOR AS1002T]] - ''2-Bay NAS System'' (RAID 0, 1, JBOD) :[[Marvell]] ARMADA 385 CPU, 512MB RAM, GbE LAN, USB 3.0 *[[ASUSTOR AS3202T]] - ''2-Bay NAS System'' (HDMI 1.4b, 4K Playback, RAID) :[[Intel Celeron]] @1.6GHz Quad-Core CPU (''Braswell''), 2GB RAM, 1x GbE LAN *[[ASUSTOR AS6202T]] - ''2-Bay Intel Quad-Core NAS'' • [https://www.amazon.com/ASUSTOR-AS6202T-2-Bay-INTEL-Quad-Core/dp/B014MRW45U B014MRW45U] :[[Intel Celeron]] @1.6GHz Quad-Core CPU (''Braswell''), 2GB RAM, 1x GbE LAN *[[Synology DS216J]] - ''2-Bay Desktop NAS'' [[Category:English Documentation]]
